Nov. 2, 2013 D US Open Brass Band Championships
US Open Brass Band Championships 0 Entertainments Contest
us-open-brass-band-championships
First Contest 2003.
Norris Cultural Arts Center, St. Charles, Illinois, USA Most entertaining band: Chicago Brass Band Best featured brass soloist: Andrew Malovance (cornet, Chicago Brass Band) Best performance of a march (Roy Newsome Memorial Award): Eastern Iowa Brass Band (playing The Melody Shop) Best new composition or arrangement: The Carrollton March (Arthur Clifton arr William Waterman) (played by Capital City Brass Band) Most outstanding percussion section: Chicago Brass Band
Oct. 1, 2013, 8:24 p.m. Oct. 15, 2014, 10:49 a.m.
1 Fountain City Brass Joseph Parisi
2 Chicago Brass Band Colin Holman
3 Capital City Brass Band William Waterman
4 Dublin Silver Band Tim Jameson
5 Prairie Brass Band Dallas Niermeyer
6 Illinois Brass Band Stephen Squires
7 Eastern Iowa Brass Band Alexander Beamer
